examples.example: 每天我都会乘坐公共汽车去上班，既环保又便捷。

translate.english: Every day I will take the bus to go to work, which is both environmentally friendly and convenient.

examples.example: 我喜欢乘坐公共汽车去探索城市的各个角落，感受不同的风景和文化。

translate.english: I like to take the bus to explore every corner of the city and feel different landscapes and cultures.

examples.example: 我经常和朋友们一起乘坐公共汽车去游玩，享受快乐的时光。

translate.english: I often take the bus to play with friends and enjoy the happy time.
